name: AlCu
note: This file currently is focused on quantities for eutectic microstructure prediction in binary alloys.

solidus_eutectic_temperature.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.

hall_petch_coefficient.reference: Michi, R. A., Sisco, K., Bahl, S. et al. Microstructural evolution and strengthening mechanisms in a heat-treated additively manufactured Al–Cu–Mn–Zr alloy. Mater. Sci. Eng. A, 840, 142928 (2022)

Cu.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.
T. Uesugi, K. Higashi, First-principles studies on lattice constants and local lattice distortions in solid solution aluminum alloys, Computational Materials Science, 67, pp. 1-10, 2013.

eutectic_contact_angle.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.

gibbs_thomson_coeff.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.

liquidus_slope.reference: O. Sinninger, M. Peters, P.W. Voorhees, Two-Phase Eutectic Growth in Al-Cu and Al-Cu-Ag, Metallurgical and Materials Transactions A, Vol. 49A, pp. 1692-1707, 2018.

taylor_factor.reference: Zhou, L., Huynh, T., Park, S. et al. Laser powder bed fusion of Al–10 wt% Ce alloys: microstructure and tensile property. J Mater Sci 55, 14611–14625 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1007/s10853-020-05037-z
